notes_text: Possession of small amounts punishable by up to 8 years in prison.

notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Slovakia}} Possession of small amounts punishable by up to 8 years in prison.<ref>{{cite news |title = High contrast |url = https://www.economist.com/europe/2010/08/26/high-contrast |newspaper = [[The Economist]] |location = London |issn = 0013-0613 |oclc = 60625410 |date = 26 August 2010 |access-date = 25 June 2012 |archive-url = https://archive.today/20190110221328/https://www.economist.com/europe/2010/08/26/high-contrast |archive-date = 10 January 2019 |url-status = live}}</ref><ref name="WSJSlovakia">{{cite news |title = Slovakia's Incoming Leftist Premier Wants to Relax Tough Cannabis Laws |first = Leos |last = Rousek |url = https://blogs.wsj.com/emergingeurope/2012/04/03/slovakias-incoming-leftist-premier-wants-to-relax-tough-cannabis-laws/ |work = [[The Wall Street Journal]] |date = 3 April 2012 |access-date = 25 June 2012 |archive-date = 21 July 2018 |archive-url = https://web.archive.org/web/20180721073421/https://blogs.wsj.com/emergingeurope/2012/04/03/slovakias-incoming-leftist-premier-wants-to-relax-tough-cannabis-laws/ |url-status = live }}</ref>
